flowRoot.flowPara: How many new trades can we enter today?

text.tspan: (method independent), based on: available cash, number of
unconditional exit signals, risk profile, exit delays
The algorithm for this selection may use a pool index indicator
based on: n_pos, cash, unconditional exit signals, exit delays
For each entry signal: check if position available, calculate

flowRoot.flowPara: Rank based exit? - calculate required ranks
